titles.title: Relating to the petition filed with respect to certain customs entries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 7/13/1993--Introduced. Deems appropriately filed, under the Tariff Act of 1930 and other Federal law, a petition relating to certain customs entries.
